titleStmt.title: The peace and joy of the soul procured and preserved

publicationStmt.publisher: printed for W. Freeman, at the Bible over-against the Middle-Temple-gate,in Fleet-street,

notesStmt.note: "Prayers for procuring and preserving the peace and joy of the soul" has caption title on p. 81; register and pagination are continuous.
Reproduction of the original in the Worcester College Library, Oxford.

place.placeName: the Bible over-against the Middle-Temple-gate,in Fleet-street
